channel.title: The forvision package for R on the Forvision project
channel.description: Recent content in The forvision package for R on the Forvision project

item.title: How to download and install
item.description: Installation You can install the development version of the forvision package (containing the latest improvements and bug fixes) from github: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("forvis/forvision")

item.title: Loading data
item.description: Read data from URL (from example datasets) You can use R base function read.csv()to read data from URL sources: myData <- read.csv("RUL") You can use the RULs for examples datasets from the section datasets Examples: 1) load time series data: data_ts <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/forvis/forvision_data/master/example1_TSTS.csv") head(data_ts) series_id value timestamp 1 Y1 3103.96 1984 2 Y1 3360.27 1985 3 Y1 3807.63 1986 4 Y1 4387.88 1987 5 Y1 4936.99 1988 6 Y1 5379.

item.title: Problems and Issues
item.description: Problems and Issues Please report any issues you may encounter in our issues page on github
